description.en:
After being poisoned by the woman responsible for her mother’s death, Princess Marianne vows revenge! In death, she strikes a deal with the demon Yurisina who will reside in her body and enact vengeance on Marianne’s behalf. Sounds easy enough, right? But can Yurisina play the part of an obedient princess long enough to fulfill her end of the pact?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7748), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-demonic-contract), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-demonic-contract/info), [Lalatoon](https://global.lalatoon.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/6906)
*All English platforms are using the Copin translation for season 1 & 2, but COPIN's deal expired and it was removed from their platform.*
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9945/)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/contrat-demoniaque)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Perjanjian-Bangsa-Iblis/3448)
description.fr:
Une jeune démone est invoquée par la plus détestable des princesses. Celle-ci vient d'être assassinée et lui fait une requête unique: prendre possession de son corps pour exécuter sa vengeance! Cette procédure ne plaît pas vraiment à la démone, mais qu'importe: elle va pouvoir semer la discorde dans le royaume, et qu'est-ce qu'une jeune et jolie démone pourrait bien préférer à cela? L'amour, peut-être?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/185), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc666), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7748), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-demonic-contract)
*All English platforms are using the Copin translation.*
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9945/)

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Perjanjian-Bangsa-Iblis/3448)
description.id:
Yurisina, putri sang Raja Iblis, hidup secara normal ketika dia dipanggil oleh manusia yang akan mati. Tapi bukan sembarangan manusia, tapi adalah Putri pertama Kerajaan Pedin, Marianne. Selama Yurisina hidup di tubunya, Marianne meminta Yurisina untuk membalas dendamkan kepada orang yang meracuninya.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/185), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc666), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7748), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-demonic-contract)
*All English platforms are using the Copin translation.*
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9945/)

description.ko:
마왕의 딸인 유리시나는 처음 성인이 되고 나서 인간과 혼을 담보로 계약을 맺어 당당한
마족으로 인정 받고 싶어 한다. 그때, 페드인 왕국의 공주 마리엔이 그녀를 소환하게 되고
자신을 독살한 오펠리우스 왕비에게 복수하고자 대신 살아 달라고 부탁하는데…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/185), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc666), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7748), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-demonic-contract)
*All English platforms are using the Copin translation.*

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Perjanjian-Bangsa-Iblis/3448)
description.pt-br:
Ao chegar na fase adulta , Yuri-sina, filha do Rei demônio, precisa assinar um contrato com algum humano para ter seu reconhecimento no mundo dos demônios. Porém ninguém queria assinar contrato com ela, até que uma princesa a convoca: Marianne, a princesa do Reino Pedin, assim elas formam um contrato com garantia de alma. Com esse contrato Marianne quer se vingar de sua madrasta, a rainha dos Ophelius, que a tinha envenenado.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

description.ru:
Дочь короля демонов Юрисина по достижении совершеннолетия заключила контракт с человеком, взяв в залог его душу. Она мечтала о признании от великих демонов. Однако у этого человека не было желания. Но в однажды он вселил Юрисину в тело принцессы, находившейся на краю гибели. Это была первая принцесса королевства Пейдин Мариэн. В обмен на свою душу Мариэн попросила о том, чтобы выжить и отомстить её мачехе – императрице Офелиус.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/185), [BiliBili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc666), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7748), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-demonic-contract)
*All English platforms are using the Copin translation.*
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9945/)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/contrat-demoniaque)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Perjanjian-Bangsa-Iblis/3448)
description.uk:
Юрисіна, дочка Короля демонів, після свого повноліття хотіла, щоб її визнали великим демоном. А саме, коли вона укладе контракт з людиною зі заставою в якості душі. У той самий час принцеса королівства Педин, Маріен, закликає її. Маріен просить Юрисіну зайняти її місце, щоб помститися королеві Офеліус, яка отруїла принцесу.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

description.zh:
魔王女儿尤莉娜为了成为被认可的魔族，开始了和人类以灵魂为担保的契约任务。 第一个召唤她的契约人是被毒杀的玛丽安公主，委托她代自己活下去并报复毒死自己的王妃！魔女因此开始了一场在皇室内的斗智斗勇的魔族任务升级路…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD/2437), [Kakaopage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55954307)

biography.en:
A part of the duo Cloud Light & Woonhye, a duo team of a writer Cloud Light and artist [Woonhye](https://mangadex.org/author/422e8017-74fa-4b51-a870-a3c9ed76e249/woonhye).

---
**Associated Names:**
- Cloud-Light
- C. Light
- C.Light
- C.night
- Cloudy
---

**Name (in native language):**
- 구름빛
